headline: Halliburton Announces Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, February 12, 2025--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) announced today that its board of directors has declared a 2025 first quarter dividend of seventeen cents ($0.17) a share on the Company’s common stock payable on March 26, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 5, 2025.

headline: Halliburton Stock Hits 52-Week Low: Time to Buy or Bail?
summary: HAL's heavy North American exposure, margin compression and slowing international growth paint a challenging picture for the company in 2025.
